text.text_translated: Asteroids are rocks in space. NASA wants to track some smaller asteroids. These asteroids are 140 metres big or more. We think there are 25,000 of these asteroids. NASA has tracked about 8,000 of them. So, 17,000 are still not known. NASA wants to track them because they can be a serious danger. For example, in 2013, a small asteroid exploded above a city in Russia. It was 19 metres big. It hurt 1,200 people. The asteroids that are 140 metres or more are much more dangerous. They can be a serious danger if they come near Earth.
